DOC.brief_summary: High-intensity interval training ( HIT ) demonstrate effective strategy improve marker health fitness across wide range healthy clinical population . Currently however , limited evidence examine effectiveness HIT old adult ( > 50 year ) . HIT appeal strategy group potential impact cardiorespiratory muscular fitness , play important role maintain functional fitness quality life time-efficient manner . Developing understanding novel strategy deliver type exercise training may ultimately provide viable alternative traditional mode exercise train broad range participant . As , purpose study evaluate effect novel , high-intensity interval training exercise protocol improve physical fitness adult age 50 year . This research also aim evaluate type training intervention feasible population , analysis adherence intervention fidelity .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Novel High-intensity Interval Training Physical Fitness Older Adults
DOC.criteria: 1 . Must age 5085 year 2 . Must able provide inform consent participate 3 . Must free exclusion criterion 1 . Symptoms know presence heart disease major atherosclerotic cardiovascular disease 2 . Early family history sudden cardiac death 3 . Condition injury comorbidity affect ability undertake exercise 4 . Diabetes mellitus 5 . Pregnancy likelihood pregnancy
